summary: A large quest mod that adds a new arena element to Skyrim while maintaining a lore-friendly feel. Experience one of the two factions the arena has to offer. Fight in familiar matches such as Team Deathmatch, Deathmatch, Free for All, and more! Fight against unique opponents and claim the title of grand champion! Come, experience the best ar
descriptionHtml:
Get an improved version of this mod over at Skyrim SE:Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4435/?

THOSE OF YOU COMPLAINING OF AN INFINITE LOADING SCREEN & GENERAL PERFORMANCE ISSUES...:
I know Dwemer Colosseum has stability issues from time to time. Some of these problems arise randomly, others I think are caused by the engine. Assuming you have a decent computer, I recommend you install the following:

SSME (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50305/?) - This mod helps reduce crashing by extending the amount of memory the engine can use. This should cover you in regards to RAM limitations set by the engine (3.1GB is an insta-crash)

Any ENB with ENBoost (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24235/?) - This helps reduce your VRAM usage.
I use this one, since it is close to vanilla and does not use any blur effects.

And of course you should have SKSE (http://skse.silverlock.org/) for the functionality it gives. Many other mods require it. Note that SKSE will eventually include the changes made in SSME. Then you will only need SKSE. Until then I recommend using SKSE+SSME.

SKSE IS REQUIRED.

AN ALTERNATIVE START MOD IS REQUIRED. IF YOU DO NOT HAVE ONE, DOWNLOAD ONE HERE:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557] Live Another Life [/url]

STARTING A NEW GAME IS *NOT* REQUIRED.

PLACE AN ALTERNATIVE START MOD BEFORE DWEMER COLOSSEUM IN YOUR LOAD ORDER. Please also note in Live Another Life you can still choose the vanilla start option if you want. That will bypass whatever issue my mod is having with the bethesda new game intro.

[center][youtube]0Xnue7BQG7s[/youtube][youtube]JvRagn8z3Bs[/youtube][/center]

What this mod features...

Watching fights, betting on fights, fighting in fights, even manipulating fights!

Arena matches include:

Gladiator (1v1), Team Gladiator (min 3v3-6v6 max), Mage in the Cage, Free For All

Join one of two factions to explore a fully voiced questline leading up to your reign as grandchampion. Experience the innovations of a true warrior and a scholar as the ultimate prize of your life.

Remember... the Colosseum hungers for blood, and you hunger for the sound of battle vibrating through your very soul! Let us all get what we want in the one, the only, Dwemer Colosseum!

Recommended Mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045/?]My Home is your Home[/url] (very useful for airship)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3871]Weapons of the Third Era[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18436]ASIS[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]

Regarding issues (FAQ/Troubleshooting):
"Help my game crashed" - Probably a conflict or your system had a hiccup. This mod is not going to run well on low machines.

"When I start a new game my character is stuck looking at a cart, and I can't move" - Read the "important information" like you should have from the start.

"Your mod broke my game" - ...no... it didn't... >.>

Permissions: This mod is to remain Nexus-exclusive. Meaning that is is not to be re-uploaded to any other website, or at all for that matter without my permission.

I would like to thank raden5 (Dwarven Mechanical Equipment), LittleBaron (Dwemer Exploding Traps Bombs and Arrows), and Varence (Dwemer Luggage) for giving me permission to use their mods. However I ended up not integrating them for various reasons.
author: Korodic

files.name: Dwemer Colosseum
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed bug where while talking to DB guy the quest would cease to progress.
Fixed rare instance where threshers would stay on forever due to an unchecked event in a criminal match.
Improved arena exterior.
Other minor misc. improvements.

files.name: Dwemer Colosseum
files.changelogHtml: TESVEdit - Cleaned the mod, removed the dirty edit affecting the Winterhold bridge.

files.name: Dwemer Colosseum
files.changelogHtml:
Removed resetting characters upon entering cells. Should reduce the risk of crashes, or entirely eliminate them.
Added extra details into the arena floor.
Added more interactive crowd members cheering you on!

files.name: Dwemer Colosseum
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed invisible wall issue.
Enhanced arena floor.
Added work-around paralysis resistance (not immunity, resistance is not native to the game and therefore may appear somewhat strange, but it is effective) to opponents since Power Shot proved to be so OP.

files.name: Dwemer Colosseum
files.changelogHtml: Added a killbox beneath the arena for the occasional glitched fall-through.
